name: Roasted Beet Orange and Quinoa Salad
description: This vegan recipe for roasted beet orange and quinoa salad is full of protein, flavor, and texture. ItÂ´s dressed in a sweet balsamic vinaigrette. It is a great lunch option.
recipeIngredient: 2 medium Roasted beets (cut into small dice (see notes))
3/4 tsp. Agave nectar (or other plant-based sweetener)

itemListElement.text: In a large bowl combine quinoa, oranges, beets, and pumpkin seeds.
itemListElement.name: In a large bowl combine quinoa, oranges, beets, and pumpkin seeds.

itemListElement.text: Add the desired amount of dressing and season to taste.
itemListElement.name: Add the desired amount of dressing and season to taste.

itemListElement.text: Place vinegar, garlic clove, and mustard in a blender and blend on high until smooth.
itemListElement.name: Place vinegar, garlic clove, and mustard in a blender and blend on high until smooth.

itemListElement.text: Through the top of the blender, gradually pour in the oil, while running the blender on low/medium. The mixture will thicken as the oil is blended in.
itemListElement.name: Through the top of the blender, gradually pour in the oil, while running the blender on low/medium. The mixture will thicken as the oil is blended in.

itemListElement.text: After all of the oil has been added, pour in 3 tbsp. of water, and agave nectar.
itemListElement.name: After all of the oil has been added, pour in 3 tbsp. of water, and agave nectar.

keywords: mexican quinoa salad, roasted beet salad, vegan quinoa salad
